Package ddf.security.sts

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthNStatementProvider
    This class will always return the unspecified string to the SAML Token Provider
    PropertiesConverter
    Custom converter to transform a string into a Properties instance.
    PropertiesWrapper
    A wrapper to handle properties with variables
    PropertyCallbackHandler
    Callback handler for signature and encryption properties files.
    PropertyPlaceholderWrapper
    property-placeholder misbehaves when set to reload, causing the bundle to bounce for several minutes after a config change.
    StaticStsProperties
    A customized static implementation of the STSPropertiesMBean.
    STSEventListener
    STSEventListener that logs events send by the STS during operations and logs it to the DDF SecurityLogger.
    StsStaticService
    This class was created as a workaround for the cxf issue https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/CXF-6673 Remove this class and use StaticService once the issue has been addressed
    SubjectDNConstraintsInterceptor
